controller

Class Controller

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.Controller
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Observer

    public class Controller
extends java.lang.Object
implements Observer
    Class representing the main controller object of the Vector Racer system. Handles user input events on the view.
